thread.title: Bce, depositi o/n in lieve aumento a 699,728 mld, prestiti marginali 40 mln Bond |

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in lieve aumento a 699,728 mld, prestiti marginali 40 mln Bond |
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 9 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 40 54 Use of overnight deposit facility 699,728 699,449 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click . To see graph, right-click and select 'graph' option. (Reporting by Frankfurt newsroom)
